``` {r boxplot, echo=FALSE, eval= show_plot, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE,results='asis',fig.align = 'center'}
cat("## 96-Well plot primer archivo")


ggplot(data = params$imported$boxplot) +
      geom_circle(aes(
        x0 = col,
        y0 = row,
        r = 0.5,
        fill = as.numeric(value)
      )) +
      coord_equal() +
      scale_x_continuous(breaks = 1:12, expand = expansion(mult = c(0.01, 0.01))) +
      scale_y_continuous(
        breaks = 1:8,
        labels = LETTERS[1:8],
        expand = expansion(mult = c(0.01, 0.01)),
        trans = reverse_trans()
      ) +
      scale_fill_gradientn(colours = terrain.colors(40)) +
      labs(
        title = "96 Well plate of TRECs",
        subtitle = "Cp or log10(Conc) values",
        x = "Col",
        y = "Row"
      ) +
      theme_bw()
```

``` {r boxplot_long, echo=FALSE,eval=show_plot_unique, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE,results='asis',fig.align = 'center'}
cat("## Box plot 3 archivos")

var1 <- params$imported$lista[1]


cp1 <- as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", params$imported$cp1))


data3 <- data.frame(A=cp1)
colnames(data3) <- c(var1)

boxplot(data3,
        main="Box Plot of Cp of different files",
        xlab="files",
        ylab="Cp",
        col=c("blue","orange","green"))

df.m <- reshape2::melt(data3, id.vars = NULL)

p <- ggplot(df.m,aes(x = variable, y = value,fill=value))
p + geom_violin()

```

``` {r boxplot_long2, echo=FALSE,eval=show_plot2, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE,results='asis',fig.align = 'center'}
var1 <- params$imported$lista[1]
var2 <- params$imported$lista[2]

cp1 <- as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", params$imported$cp1))
cp2 <- as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", params$imported$cp2))

data3 <- data.frame(A=cp1,
                    B=cp2)
colnames(data3) <- c(var1,var2)

boxplot(data3,
        main="Box Plot of Cp of different files",
        xlab="files",
        ylab="Cp",
        col=c("blue","orange","green"))

df.m <- reshape2::melt(data3, id.vars = NULL)

p <- ggplot(df.m,aes(x = variable, y = value,fill=value))
p + geom_violin()
```

